infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TCG Binder needs camera access to scan and identify your trading cards using AI recognition.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TCG Binder needs access to your photo library so you can select photos of trading cards to scan and identify.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow TCG Binder to use your camera to scan and identify your trading cards using AI recognition.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow TCG Binder to access your photos so you can select trading card images to scan and identify.
